exploreUrl:
<js>
const res = java.connect(`${baseUrl}/sort/`);
var regex = /<li><a href="(\/sort\/\d+_\d+\/)">([^<]+)<\/a><span>共 (\d+) 本<\/span><\/li>/g;
const html = res.body();

const categories = [];
let match;
while ((match = regex.exec(html)) != null) {
  java.log(match[2])
  categories.push({
    url: match[1],
    title: match[2],
    count: parseInt(match[3], 10)
  });
}

JSON.stringify(categories);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if (result.match(/no-js/)) {
    java.webView("", Url("源站："), "");
    result = java.ajax(baseUrl);
}
var last = "";
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    last = String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, "");
}
java.put('last',last);
result;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if (result.includes("no-js")) {
    for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        try {
            sleep(Math.random() * 500);
            if (!cache.get("uaalock")) {
                cache.put("uaalock", 1, 60);
                result = java.webView("", baseUrl, "");
                if (result.includes("no-js")) {
                    cookie.removeCookie(baseUrl);
                    result = java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl, "验证").body();
                }
                cache.delete("uaalock");
            }
        } catch {
            cache.delete("uaalock");
            continue;
        }
        while (cache.get("uaalock")) {}
        if (!result.includes("no-js")) {
            break;
        }
    }
}
if (/内容已隐藏|请访问源网站/.test(result)) {
    for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        if (java.getElements(".article").attr("code") == "478") {
            try {
                sleep(Math.random() * 500);
                if (!cache.get("uaacodelock")) {
                    cache.put("uaacodelock", 1, 60);
                    var Code = java.getVerificationCode(Url("源站：") + '/captcha,{"headers":' + cache.get("uaaheaders") + ',"method": "GET"}');
                    var requestBody = "checkCode=" + Code;
                    var headers = JSON.parse(cache.get("uaaheaders"));
                    var option = {
                        method: "POST",
                        body: String(requestBody),
                        headers: headers
                    };
                    java.ajax(Url("源站：") + "/checkLimitCode," + JSON.stringify(option));
                    cache.delete("uaacodelock");
                }
            } catch {
                cache.delete("uaacodelock");
                continue;
            }
            while (cache.get("uaacodelock")) {}
            result = java.ajax(baseUrl + ',{"headers":' + cache.get("uaaheaders") + ',"method": "GET"}');
        } else {
            cookie.removeCookie(Url("源站："));
            result = java.ajax(baseUrl + ',{"headers":' + cache.get("uaaheaders") + ',"method": "GET"}');
        }
        if (!/内容已隐藏|请访问源网站/.test(result)) {
            break;
        }
    }
}
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
result = J.select('.article').html();
</js>

ruleSearch.name: $.title

searchUrl:
<js>
(function (e) {
    return `{{Url("源站：") + Path}}/search?{{
        let separator = "@@";
        let param = key.split(separator);
        // 搜索关键词
        let searchParam = "keyword="+param[0];
        if(param.length>=2){
          //标签
          searchParam += "&includeTags="+param[1].replace(/，/g,",")
        }
        searchParam;
    }}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&size=10`;
}(key));
</js>

bookSourceComment:
修改：1、优化图片文字替换函数，防止重复弹窗；by：xiaohan231-2024/11/08

修改：1、优化正文图片文字替换；2、优化正文净化规则；by：xiaohan231-2024/11/04

修改：1、增加XH发布页订阅源变量和登录页激活码两种激活方式；2、换源网址改为在登录填写；3、修复正文换行错乱；by：xiaohan231-2024/11/02

修改：1、修改正文图片替换函数，可通过验证码函数添加替换文字；by：xiaohan231-2024/11/01

修改：1、优化正文替换净化(换行错乱可用重新分段修复)；2、目录顺序重排；3、优化目录下一页规则；by：xiaohan231-2024/10/25

修改：1、新研究出一个简单的换源网址方法，新网址放源变量说明，链接自动替换；2、更新网址后，刷新书架自动替换详情和目录源站；3、修复正文图片文字替换；by：xiaohan231-2024/10/22

/*
  正文图片净化 by 平静
  匹配字来源，依顺序
  赘婿的荣耀前10章，前100字，到"丁"字
  武林淫魔传前3章，13个字，到"漏"字
  天选预言家分卷阅读前3章，6个字，到"锦"字
  丝之恋 前3章，5个字，到"党"字
*/

ruleSearch.name: .right@.name@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = [];
var list = java.getElements('.chapter-list.1').select('li');
for (i in list) {
    data.push({
        'index': String(list[i].select('a').attr('href')).replace(/.*?\/(\d+)\..*?$/, '$1'),
        'title': list[i].select('a').text(),
        'link': list[i].select('a').attr('href')
    });
}
data.sort((a, b) => parseInt(a.index) - parseInt(b.index));
data;
</js>

function method(result){
const {java,source,cookie}=this;
result=result
.replace(/sao/gi,'骚')
.replace(/diao/gi,'屌')
.replace(/zhong/gi,'种')
.replace(/nai/gi,'奶')
.replace(/ai/gi,'爱')
.replace(/se/gi,'色')
.replace(/cha/gi,'插')
.replace(/shen/gi,'呻')
.replace(/she(头)/gi,'舌$1')
.replace(/kua/gi,'胯')
.replace(/she/gi,'射')
.replace(/(呻)yin/gi,'$1吟')
.replace(/yin(道|户|蒂)/gi,'阴$1')
.replace(/yin/gi,'淫')
.replace(/xing/gi,'性')
.replace(/bi/gi,'逼')
.replace(/cao/gi,'操')
.replace(/chun/gi,'春')
.replace(/lun/gi,'伦')
.replace(/giang/gi,'肛')
.replace(/gan/gi,'干')
.replace(/luan/gi,'乱')
.replace(/jian/gi,'奸')
.replace(/ju/gi,'菊')
.replace(/chao/gi,'潮')
.replace(/dong/gi,'洞')
.replace(/rou/gi,'肉')
.replace(/ru/gi,'乳')
.replace(/xue/gi,'穴')
.replace(/nu/gi,'奴')
.replace(/bang/gi,'棒')
.replace(/jing/gi,'精')
.replace(/pi/gi,'屁')
.replace(/tun/gi,'臀');
return java.t2s(result)
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try{
	//Aes解密
	matchResult=src.match(/html\(d\(['"](.+)['"],\s+['"](.+)['"]\)\);/);
	string=matchResult[1];
	code=java.md5Encode(matchResult[2]);
	iv=code.substring(0,16);
	key=code.substring(16);
	result=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding",key,iv).decryptStr(string)
}catch(err){
	//解密失败使用webView加载重新获取内容
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl+',{"webView":true}');
	result=java.getString('#C0NTENT@html',src)
}
result
</js>
<js>method(result)</js>
